Articles.Content:
Looking for music that appeal to the Ksp community for a channel debuting in April, 

Music Requirements:

-Copyright free 

-free

-preferably without lyrics

If you have any suggestions give me a song title and link below, 

-theLizard

Sadly most of my Background Music aren't copyright free but i have two tho

K-391 Everybody and Kontinuum Aware, maybe Flyaway

But yeah if you're interested with my Music that i use when playing KSP But are copyrighted 

It's basically all of FTETTM Theme and All WW2 MoH game Theme
